# Test Cases for Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) and Least Common Multiple (LCM)
## GCD Test Case
```{r GCD_test_cases}
c(gcd(72, 8) == 8, gcd(-1, 531) == 1, gcd(47011, 73618) == 1)
```
## LCM Test Case
```{r LCM_test_cases}
c(lcm(c(-12, 21)) == 84, lcm(c(4789, 6123, 199)) == 5835286353)
```
